amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 118-656 to add engaging in efforts to interfere in U.S. federal, state, and local elections to List of Qualifications for "Entities of Concern.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crockett amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crockett amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
